attributes.action: Include a "None of the Above" on Voting Forms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to propose a "None of the Above" section on voting forms for local and general elections to allow those who feel un-represented by what is on offer to be counted. In past elections, low turnout has lead to an electoral mockery, when a party can be given mandate by a small percentage of the possible electorate, as those who feel dis-enfranchised do not bother to vote. This change may then give a more representative indication of the veiws and wishes of the British voter.
